name: datapilot-cli
description: Enterprise-grade streaming multi-format data analysis with comprehensive statistical insights and intelligent relationship detection - supports CSV, JSON, Excel, TSV, Parquet - memory-efficient, cross-platform

scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:package: npm pack && npm install -g datapilot-cli-*.tgz && npm run test:installation && npm uninstall -g datapilot-cli
scripts.pre-release: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:all && npm run build && npm run test:installation
scripts.build:binaries: npm run build && caxa --input . --output binaries/datapilot --exclude-output binaries
scripts.build:win: npm run build && caxa --input . --output binaries/datapilot-win.exe --exclude-output binaries
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && caxa --input . --output binaries/datapilot-macos --exclude-output binaries
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && caxa --input . --output binaries/datapilot-linux --exclude-output binaries
scripts.build:all-platforms: npm run build:win && npm run build:mac && npm run build:linux

author: DataPilot Team
